ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Interface LightSample

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectionalLightSample, PointLightSample, ScaledLightSample

    public interface LightSample
    A recorded sample from a Light.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean castShadowRay(VisibilityFunction3 vf)
      Determines if the light ray is obstructed.
      Vector3 getDirToLight()
      Gets the direction from which the light originates.
      Color getRadiantIntensity()
      Gets the radiant intensity along the specified ray.

    • Method Detail

      • getDirToLight

        Vector3 getDirToLight()
        Gets the direction from which the light originates.
        Returns:
        The Vector3 pointing toward the light source.

      • getRadiantIntensity

        Color getRadiantIntensity()
        Gets the radiant intensity along the specified ray.
        Returns:
        The radiant intensity.

      • castShadowRay

        boolean castShadowRay(VisibilityFunction3 vf)
        Determines if the light ray is obstructed.
        Parameters:
        vf - The VisibilityFunction3 to use to test visibility between points.
        Returns:
        A value indicating if the light ray is obstructed.
